title: Gutar Gu
overview: Ritu joins a coaching class in Bhopal and notices Anuj on the first day. She introduces herself to Anuj, which startles him. He seeks advice from friends on how to impress her. Ritu asks Anuj to help her explore the city but he cancels at the last minute. Anuj writes a love letter and must now confess his feelings to Ritu and pray she feels the same way.

tv.episodeOverview: Anuj and Ritu are going to see each other after months of long-distance separation in Ahmedabad. Both are getting unsolicited advice from their respective friends on the possibility of them getting intimate with each other. As Anuj arrives in Ahmedabad, the tension between them begins to build as both try to follow the advice given by their friends.
